wikipedia_page.main: Laurie Graham (born 25 November 1947 in Leicester, England) is a journalist, scriptwriter and novelist. She lives in County Dublin, Ireland.

response: * Laurie Graham (born 1960), Canadian retired downhill skier, member of several Halls of Fame
* Laurie Graham (novelist) (born 1947), English journalist, scriptwriter and novelist
Laurie Graham is a Canadian downhill skier who represented Canada at the 1980, 1984 and 1988 Winter Olympics.
Laurie Graham may also refer to:
* Laurie Graham (novelist) (born 1947), journalist, scriptwriter and novelist
